mapper.select: select C.CMT_NO as commentNo,U.USERID,C.TEXT as text,C.COMMENT_DATE from BT_COMMENT C ,BT_USER U , BT_PHOTO_FOLDER P where C.PF_NO = P.PF_NO AND C.USER_NO=U.USER_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BT_PHOTO_FOLDER(CMT_NO as commentNo, PF_NO as pfNo , USER_NO as userNo, TEXT as text ,COMMENT_DATE as date) VALUES(SEQ_BT_PF_NO.nextval, #{pfNo}, #{userNo}, #{text}, sysdate )
mapper.select: select P.TITLE, P.PF_NO from BT_PHOTO_FOLDER P, BT_USER U WHERE U.USER_NO = P.USER_NO AND U.USER_NO=#{value} ORDER BY P.PF_NO
select T.TM_NM from BT_PHOTO_FOLDER P, BT_TM T WHERE T.PF_NO = P.PF_NO AND P.PF_NO=#{value} ORDER BY P.PF_NO
